get phenotype codes

get_codes.Rd

get phenotype codes

Usage

get_codes(pheno_id, strip = "\\.")

Arguments

pheno_id

a string, a valid phenotype id (see get_phenotypes())

strip

a regular expression to strip from the codes, NULL for no stripping

Value

a data.table
